comments.body: ~~Why another module affected in this pull request?~~ Maybe the `download` module should explicitly specify dependency from `got v8` in its `package.json` file?

From what I understand from the [readme](https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/blob/master/README.md#i-want-to-update-a-package-to-a-new-major-version), it is to avoid breaking existing type definitions:

> If there are other packages on DefinitelyTyped that are incompatible with the new version, you will need to add path mappings to the old version. You will also need to do this for packages depending on packages depending on the old version.
